sentence.Network_en: Amy lifted her arm to wave. "Goodbye," she called.
sentence.Network_cn: 埃米举起胳膊挥挥手。“再见，”她喊道。

sentence.Network_en: I waved goodbye and went down the stone harbour steps.
sentence.Network_cn: 我挥手告别，然后走下港口石阶。

sentence.Network_en: He has probably said goodbye to his last chance of Olympic gold.
sentence.Network_cn: 他可能已经失去了夺取奥运会金牌的最后机会。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: contraction of God be with you!, with good substituted on the pattern of phrases such as good morning

encyclopedia.content: 歌曲名称： グッバイ（GOODBYE） 歌手： 4MINUTE 所属专辑：I MY ME MINE（日本2单） 发行时间：2010年07月28日 唱片类型：Dance Pop 作词：Hidehiko Morino 作曲：Hidehiko Morino / Takashi Fukuda 歌词： 羽のない天使が今 空をただ见上げている なにも恐れない 感じない 何かを失うことが 何かを抱きしめるよ 本当の强さが见える 今君を 忘れていくよ 深い海の中 さよなら 目を闭じて 浮かんだ君の颜 今 届けたい想いはないよ

entry.def: You say 'Goodbye' to someone when you or they are leaving, or at the end of a telephone conversation.
When you say your goodbyes, you say something such as 'Goodbye' when you leave.

example.ex: He said his goodbyes knowing that a long time would pass before he would see his child again...
example.tran: 他道了别，知道要过很久才能再见到他的孩子。

example.ex: I said a hurried goodbye and walked home in the cold...
example.tran: 我匆忙地说了声再会便冒着严寒走回了家。

entry.def: When you say goodbye to someone, you say something such as 'Goodbye', 'Bye', or 'See you', when you or they are leaving. You can also wave goodbye to someone.

example.ex: He wanted to say goodbye to you...

entry.tran: 向…说再见；承认不会（或不再）拥有
entry.def: If you say goodbye or wave goodbye to something that you want or usually have, you accept that you are not going to have it.

example.ex: He has probably said goodbye to his last chance of Olympic gold...
example.tran: 他可能已经失去了夺取奥运会金牌的最后机会。

example.ex: We can wave goodbye to the sort of protection that people at work need and deserve.
example.tran: 我们就只能向工作的人所需要且应得的那种保护说拜拜了。

auth_sentence.content: No one was ready to say goodbye to Rafa.
auth_sentence.res_content: No one was ready to say goodbye to Rafa.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: No one was ready to say goodbye to Rafa.

auth_sentence.content: Without saying goodbye, he snapped shut the phone.
auth_sentence.res_content: Without saying goodbye, he snapped shut the phone.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Without saying goodbye, he snapped shut the phone.

auth_sentence.content: He never said hello and he never said goodbye.
auth_sentence.res_content: He never said hello and he never said goodbye.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He never said hello and he never said goodbye.

Sentence.sentence: Speakers or English have a similar gesture through the hand may not be cupped and the fingers may be held more loosely, but for them the gesture means goodbye or go away, quite the opposite of the Colombian gesture.

sentences.en: I said goodbye and rushed away.

jushi.english: I'll tell you goodby at the railway station.
jushi.chinese: 我将在火车站和你告别。

jushi.english: I said goodbye and rushed away.
